text: @NBCNews Wuhan the epicenter had 1% of the population catch the virus. Of those 1% - 85% had mild symptoms. If it comes here we have a .007% of catching the virus unless you are in a hotspot. Then it’s 1%. We are 100% out of hand sanitizers and toilet paper. PANIC 🙄
